column3: NACK.  If you want to time stuff, then use -logtimestamps, lets not dirty up the code with lots of special-case timing logic.\n
@gavinandresen why do we time other things then, such as flushing, etc?\n
Either because those other things were implemented before -logtimestamps or because I didn't notice/ask that they get removed after whatever optimization they were a part of got pulled.\n
This should be inside the foreach loop...\n
@luke-jr Ah, I had it inside on another branch, but it got missed in this one. Fixed. Thanks.\n
